name: VersionAssemblies
description: Applies a version to a .NET assembly via the assemblyinfo.cs or .vb files based on the build number. Based on Microsoft sample from https://msdn.microsoft.com/Library/vs/alm/Build/overview
author: Black Marble

inputs.name: Path
inputs.label: Source folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Source folder for assemblies files, can be root as it will find all files recursively

inputs.name: VersionNumber
inputs.label: Version Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version number to apply to files, can be extraced from the build name 'Build HelloWorld_00.00.00000.0' format
